Communication Skills, credit, customer service, Customer
Service, English, Inventory, Negotiation, Pallet Jack, pick, Presentation Skills, rapport, Sales, Spanish, Phones        Additional Information      Willing to relocate: Anywhere
Authorized to work in the US for any employer
story:
Let me tell you the story of a hard-working individual who started from humble beginnings. Their journey began in the fields of California, where they spent 2012-2013 as a field worker, carefully tending to grape vines and harvesting blueberries. The work was physically demanding, but it taught them the value of dedication and attention to detail.

Moving up from the fields, they secured a position as a Produce Clerk from 2013 to 2014. Here, they learned the ins and outs of retail operations, ensuring fresh produce was always beautifully displayed and maintaining immaculate work areas. Their natural ability to provide excellent customer service began to shine through.

Their career took an exciting turn when they stepped into the role of Sales Associate at an automotive dealership from 2015 to 2016. This position allowed them to fully utilize their bilingual skills in English and Spanish, along with their natural talent for building rapport with customers. Each day brought new challenges as they guided customers through the car-buying process – from the initial greeting to the final delivery of new vehicles.

Throughout their career progression, they've developed a robust skill set including negotiation, inventory management, and exceptional communication abilities. Their education at Arvin High School and Bakersfield College has complemented their practical experience.

What makes their story particularly interesting is their openness to new opportunities – they're willing to relocate anywhere and are authorized to work for any employer in the US. It's the story of someone who started in the fields and worked their way up to become a skilled sales professional, demonstrating that with determination and a strong work ethic, significant career growth is possible.
